content.question: Directions: In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. The suggested writing time is 30 minutes. Analyze the ways in which the contrasting styles of these two paintings reflect the different economic values and social structures of France and the Netherlands in the seventeenth century.

frqParts.text: Directions: In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. The suggested writing time is 30 minutes. skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
